question: Which two nations share the "Gobi Desert"?
explanation: Gobi Desert lies in the north and north-eastern China and southern Mongolia. It lies in East Asia. This desert houses several cities along the Silk Road. This desert is bounded by the Altai Mountains, steppes of Mongolia, Taklamakan Desert, Tibetan Plateau, Hexi Corridor and North China Plain. It is a rain-shadow desert. It is Asia's second-largest desert.
